# Inception

Use `inception/<model>` with VoltAgent's model router.

## Quick start

```ts
import { Agent } from "@voltagent/core";

const agent = new Agent({
  name: "inception-agent",
  instructions: "You are a helpful assistant",
  model: "inception/mercury",
});
```

## Environment variables

- `INCEPTION_API_KEY`

## Provider package

`@ai-sdk/openai-compatible`

This provider uses the OpenAI-compatible adapter.

## Default base URL

`https://api.inceptionlabs.ai/v1/`

You can override the base URL by setting `INCEPTION_BASE_URL`.

## Provider docs

- https://platform.inceptionlabs.ai/docs

<details>
  <summary>Show models (2)</summary>

- mercury
- mercury-coder

</details>
